channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins extreme-feedback Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins extreme-feedback Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-41242|2024-08-03T12:35:49.640Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20extreme-feedback%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins extreme-feedback Plugin 1.7 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to discover information about job names attached to lamps, discover MAC and IP addresses of existing lamps, and rename lamps.
